member.name: M:TemperatureProject.Api.Controllers.AdminController.SynchronizePHPDataWithLocalDatabase
member.summary: This endpoint synchronizes data from PHPMyAdmin database with local database - it POSTS lacking measurements.

remarks.b: Question: How to run this endpoint?
remarks.br: Answer: You have to run PHPMyAdmin with SQL to make this endpoint work.

member.name: M:TemperatureProject.Api.Controllers.TemperatureDeviceController.GetDataFromPHPMyAdmin
member.summary: This endpoint returns all data from PHP MyAdmin database(from Device), mapped on DTO.
